website_summaries.verdict: This induction cooktop is quieter and has a larger cooking surface than many of its competitors.
pros: Heat turns off 30 seconds after pot or pan is removed
Larger heating area than other induction models
cons: Lowest setting is not particularly low
It's still high enough to boil water

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to help me survive a 12 week kitchen renovation. It's everything I hoped it would be. Simple operation, incredibly fast cooking times, and esthetically pleasing to boot. I'll probably keep using it even after my renovation is complete and my 48" professional gas range is back in operation. It's that good.
customer_reviews.author: Domestic Goddess

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money
customer_reviews.text: Awesome induction cooker for the money! I wish it had exact temperature control, but those are much more expensive. Once you learn each of the eight heat settings, you can make some amazing dishes. I'm using a Dutch oven from Sam's that's induction capable and works great!
customer_reviews.author: otshtandcler

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical after reading all the other reviews but it has exceeded my expectations. I got rid of my stove a couple months ago since I was not using the oven and I have a tiny Manhattan kitchen. I use this for all my cooking and it works great. It boils water faster than my gas stove did. It does seem to have a higher temperature than expected so keep it low for cooking more delicate foods.
customer_reviews.author: isabelle rossi

customer_reviews.title: Great little cooktop
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little unit. I purchased this as a temporary solution to a cooktop that died. My only complaint is that induction requires specific cookware which of course, is not what I have. That's not a negative on this piece, it's just the good news and bad news of fast induction cooktops. Now I have to decide if the replacement cooktop will be induction.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bad product
customer_reviews.text: In 16 months time this product died and I have no recourse. Will never purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: Rosalie C.

customer_reviews.title: Every kitchen should have one - unless you already have an induction stove!
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible cooking Machine! Originally we bought it to use when our kitchen was being renovated but loved its quick heat up, ease of cleaning and all around cooking so much that it has now become a permanent part of the tools we use every week to cook our food.
customer_reviews.author: owllady2250

customer_reviews.title: My wife the cook doesn't like it. I do but I don't cook nearly ...
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised. Reasonable price. My wife the cook doesn't like it. I do but I don't cook nearly as much. The only issue that I have found is that post get deposits on the bottom with this. They do a little bit with conventional gas cooking, but far less.
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Served as our primary cooktop while remodeling our kitchen.
customer_reviews.text: We really liked this cooktop...it saved our bacon when we remodeled the kitchen and made due with this cooktop (which is actually superior to the new gas stove) and an oversized toaster oven. Food gets up to temp quickly and turned itself off when the pot was removed. Once the kitchen was finished, we used the burner during a crab boil outside with great success.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Stiles

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Works great, doesn't shut down like the Nuwave induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: blue dog arts

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He loves it. I will be getting one soon for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy A.

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooktop but a bit noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice cooktop with efficient cooking and multiple speeds of cooking. Yet, the cooling fan was a bit noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Howard H.W. Chan

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, heats up quickly and works well
customer_reviews.text: Using this for some cooking videos for my work. It looks nice, heats up quickly and works well.
customer_reviews.author: TrishiaK

customer_reviews.title: I love this induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: I love this induction cooktop, I've used one like it before, and this is the first time owning one. It heats fast and is easy to control the heat level. I am definitely going to order another one!
customer_reviews.author: Tammy Warren

customer_reviews.title: A reliable cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Overall I'm very pleased with this cooktop. It heats up quickly and has a larger heating area than the Duxtop induction cooktop I have used. I use this cooktop everyday and it works beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Jewel63

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: The product was very good but I returned it because it did not fit the place on my counter where I wanted to keep it.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moody

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Boils water quickly and easy to clean. Nice extra cooking unit that I can take outside on the deck.
customer_reviews.author: Camera Shy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heats quickly and does what it says it will do.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Single Burner Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Very, nice product. Great for when the power is out and you're on an emergency generator and can't use a stove. Also great for the office when you just don't want to use a microwave
customer_reviews.author: MPH

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT...replacing a smaller,cheaper unit. Easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: Wow....I had been using a cheaper smaller type but this Waring model is super . It is substantial in weight and size and easier to operate. I will supply these into all my rental units due to its safety.
customer_reviews.author: Karen K.

customer_reviews.title: induction cooktop
customer_reviews.text: This unit is very fast at arriving at cooking tempature and seems to hold cooking tempature well. However the induction heating area is quite small and only fits a 8" pan or pot. So it's impossible to cook bacon or even a large steak.
customer_reviews.author: Grouchy 41

customer_reviews.title: Worst investment
customer_reviews.text: Horrible! You have to purchase some special type of cookware for it to work. None of my pans worked and now I'm stuck with a $50 piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: CS

customer_reviews.title: Cleaner than gas stove and kitchen stayed cooler - BUT ...
customer_reviews.text: Cleaner than gas stove and kitchen stayed cooler - BUT,,,,I expected it to be faster based on the reviews - it took 22 minutes to get 5 quarts of water boiling...2 minutes faster than my gas stove - overall, I find that insignificant
customer_reviews.author: Pigs

customer_reviews.title: OK
customer_reviews.text: Nice but the lowest setting seems way too hot to simmer anything, instead it always comes to a rapid boil
customer_reviews.author: Mark M.

customer_reviews.title: It seemed to heat more than I liked ( I was attempting to keep some chili warm ...
customer_reviews.text: Used it only once. Had to keep an eye on low (1) temperature selection. It seemed to heat more than I liked ( I was attempting to keep some chili warm without boiling or burning). I bought these for use outside when camping. I noticed that if the surface is not perfectly level, the pot will slide on the glass top. Once outside the heating circle, the unit warned me - which is good. Once I leveled it, no more sliding issues.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Waring Pro ICT200 Induction Cooktop
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product! I don't use the gas range now that I have the induction cooktop. If I can find something that saves energy, I'll try it to find out if it really works and this product does that. My next new stove will be induction cooktop.
customer_reviews.author: rocky

customer_reviews.title: Best stove-top technology ever.
customer_reviews.text: This burner is so good, I've decided to get an induction stove top when we upgrade our kitchen. Why have we been suffering with inferior products for so long, and having all the burner clean-up work associated with gas and electric burners? Never again!
customer_reviews.author: Maude

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Easy to use and to cook on.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: I can't say enough about how much I love this. It helped me make up my mind ...
customer_reviews.text: Oh, my! I can't say enough about how much I love this. It helped me make up my mind about buying a new range with induction top.
customer_reviews.author: ravensmom

customer_reviews.title: Became our Primary Cooktop!
customer_reviews.text: We have used this product for over a year in our RV. Originally we purchased it as a secondary cooking surface, however, it quickly became our primary cooktop! We love the rapid changes in cooking temperature, which rivals the gas stove we have at our home. We already had Induction Cookware so we didn't have to purchase anything extra. If using this in a RV, I highly suggest purchasing a Silicone Mat that will stop pots from migrating IF the Cooktop isn't perfectly level
customer_reviews.author: Dan Leininger

customer_reviews.title: Great so far!
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy operation. So far, it's done everything I need it to do.
customer_reviews.author: PD

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Heats up amazingly fast and cools down quickly works great for induction cookware.
customer_reviews.author: PGD

customer_reviews.title: Really nice, works well, but a little loud.
customer_reviews.text: This works really well, but the fan is pretty loud. Heats up my cast iron way faster than a regular stove top while using a fraction of the electricity. On power level 4 it was using only 350W! Cool! Easy to use, nice build quality. It doesn't seem to heat super evenly, but I can't think of a cooktop that doesn't have that problem. I like that it has a cooling fan because that typically means a much longer lifetime for the electronics. I just wish it weren't so loud!
customer_reviews.author: JRD

customer_reviews.title: Like it with limitations
customer_reviews.text: I use it once in a while. Takes a long time to boil water, so use my gas stove for that. Good for bacon and eggs, etc. So, good, but not perfect. I do like the size and portability of it.
customer_reviews.author: Arne G. Reil

product_meta.title: Cuisinart 086279096142 Induction Cooktop, One Size, Black
product_meta.description: Style Name:Cuisinart Induction CooktopThe Induction Cooktop adds cooking space to any kitchen - or any place without a kitchen! Induction technology offers an exceptional cooking experience, with instant heat up and consistent, precise heat throughout cooking. An 8-heat setting control offers total flexibility from low to highest heat. The smooth glass plate looks sleek and wipes clean in a snap. It's ideal for entertaining and holidays when cooking for a crowd. And its compact and portable size make it ideal for small spaces without a kitchen such as dorm rooms, boats, patios or RVs. This is a versatile and powerful tool that's a great addition to any kitchen - big or small! Features: Induction technology for fast heat-up|Uses up to 70% less energy than conventional cooktops|LED timer display|Easy-touch controls: On/Off 8 heat settings 150-minute timer|Elegant styling with smooth glass top|Heat stops automatically 30 seconds after pot or pan is removed|Safe – no flame no exhaust gas|Even heating – no hot spots|For use with induction-ready cookware|Limited Five Year Product Warranty
feature_bullets: Induction technology for fast heat up and consistent heat throughout cooking
8-heat setting temperature control from low to highest heat
Throws off less heat so kitchens stay cooler
Heat turns off 30 seconds after pot or pan is removed

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.0 out of 5 stars71 ratings4.0 out of 5 stars
